mapper.sql: require_id, require_title, content, priority, urgent, status, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, parent_id, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT r.require_id as require_id, r.require_title as require_title, r.content as content, r.priority as priority, r.urgent as urgent, r.status as status, r.create_user_id as create_user_id, r.create_time as create_time, r.modify_user_id as modify_user_id, r.modify_time as modify_time, r.parent_id as parent_id, r.is_del as is_del FROM t_require_merge rme INNER JOIN t_require r ON rme.require_branch_id = r.require_id AND rme.require_master_id = #{masterId} order by create_time

SELECT r.require_id as require_id, r.require_title as require_title, r.content as content, r.priority as priority, r.urgent as urgent, r.status as status, r.create_user_id as create_user_id, r.create_time as create_time, r.modify_user_id as modify_user_id, r.modify_time as modify_time, r.parent_id as parent_id, r.is_del as is_del FROM t_require_merge rme INNER JOIN t_require r ON rme.require_master_id = r.require_id AND rme.require_branch_id = #{branchId}
